an4.107:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro musikupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.107:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo gadham katta hoti no vasita?
an4.107:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.107:2.3: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.107:2.4: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.107:2.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gadham katta hoti, no vasita.
an4.107:2.6: Seyyathapi sa, bhikkhave, musika gadham katta, no vasita;
an4.107:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo vasita hoti, no gadham katta?
an4.107:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammam na pariyapunati—
an4.107:3.3: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.107:3.4: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.107:3.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vasita hoti, no gadham katta.
an4.107:3.6: Seyyathapi sa, bhikkhave, musika vasita hoti, no gadham katta;
an4.107:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gadham katta hoti no vasita?
an4.107:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammam na pariyapunati—
an4.107:4.3: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.107:4.4: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.107:4.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gadham katta hoti, no vasita.
an4.107:4.6: Seyyathapi sa, bhikkhave, musika neva gadham katta hoti, no vasita;
an4.107:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo gadham katta ca hoti vasita ca?
an4.107:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.107:5.3: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.107:5.4: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.107:5.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gadham katta ca hoti vasita ca.
an4.107:5.6: Seyyathapi sa, bhikkhave, musika gadham katta ca hoti vasita ca;
an4.107:5.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro musikupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
